product_name: The North Face Osolita Jacket - Girls' - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The North Face Osolita fleece jacket for girls combines the style of the epic Denali jacket with incredibly soft, high-pile fleece for great looks and comfort. High-loft fleece with an incredibly soft pile surface keeps her warm without weighing her down. Quick-drying, lightweight fabric resists pilling and fading, launders well, packs easily and maintains its shape. Stand-up collar with brushed lining helps eliminate chafing. The North Face Osolita fleece jacket for girls features elastic at the hem and cuffs to seal in warmth. Closeout.
short_description: The North Face Osolita fleece jacket for girls combines the style of the epic Denali jacket with incredibly soft, high-pile fleece for great looks and comfort.
